resources.string: Make sure you are in same network and the server component is running correctly.
Please enter the IP of your Computer.
Please connect to your network to establish a connection to Pigment-desktop.
Please enable Wifi to connect with your network.
Connection timed out. Is the IP-Address correct?

This colour chooser is designed to be used as a second interface while using Photoshop.
To make this work, you'll need to install an application on your computer.
It can be found under: http://github.com/Sir-M/pigment 
 
Developer: Mirko S.
